footer.description: Modern solution for property management and rental services

main.mainText2: The Rent-pult service will allow several people to manage one flat
main.mainText3: , which is often necessary when renting out an apartment. The owner will see all updates to the apartment and will be at ease knowing that everything is in order. And the tenant will see the living experience of previous tenants in this apartment, which will significantly help them in using the apartment.
main.mainText4: For each apartment in the Rent Pult system, a common information space is created between all owners, authorized representatives, and tenants of the apartment (or any other real estate object). In it, owners and tenants can see the history of rental payments, meter readings for each month, photo reports, a list of furniture and appliances in the apartment, set reminders for future events, record all the peculiarities of use, and much more.
main.title: Rent Pult
main.feature3Text: Wide selection of comfortable housing for short-term and long-term rent.
main.step1Text: Use filters to find the perfect housing that meets your requirements.
main.step2Text: Discuss rental details and arrange a viewing through our secure platform.
main.step3Text: Complete all necessary documents and enjoy your new home.
main.testimonial1: Thanks to this service, I found the perfect apartment in just a few days. The interface is intuitive, and support is always ready to help!
main.testimonial2: Great service for finding housing! Everything is transparent and honest. I found the apartment of my dreams and signed a contract without any hassle.
main.testimonial3: I've been using the service for the second time. A large selection of housing and convenient filters make it easy to find a suitable option. I recommend it!
main.readyToStart: Ready to find your perfect home?
main.ctaText: Join thousands of satisfied customers right now!
main.faq1Question: How do I register on the platform?
main.faq1Answer: Registration on our platform is simple and takes only a few minutes. Click the 'Register' button, fill in the required fields, and confirm your email.
main.faq2Question: How do I find an apartment that meets my criteria?
main.faq2Answer: Use our advanced search filters to specify your desired area, budget, number of rooms, and other parameters. The system will automatically select suitable options.
main.faq3Question: Is it safe to book housing through your platform?
main.faq3Answer: Yes, we ensure secure transactions and verify all landlords. Additionally, we offer standardized rental agreements to protect both parties.
main.faq4Question: Can I list my apartment for rent?
main.faq4Answer: Absolutely! Register as a landlord, add information about your property with photos and description, and your listing will be available to potential tenants.
main.mobileAppText: Search and book apartments wherever you are with our convenient mobile application.
main.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know about new apartments and special offers.
main.privacyNote: We respect your privacy and will never share your data with third parties.

auth.getStarted: Sign in or register to get started
